cause.description:
"They (the soldiers) participate, nay, facilitate, the endless violence and ridiculous casualties that make Iraq virtually uninhabitable in certiain areas because after four years of war, with opinions divided at home, and the nation the were sent to liberate splintering into dozens of warring factions, the only thing that's certain to them in their battle crazed minds is that their friends will be there."
"Friends?" I don't think that's a good enough reason for someone to be sent, or even compelled to go into a war zone.
1. Supporting the individual Soldiers in Iraq only makes it easier for them to stay there.
cause.mission: Activly discourage people from supporting the individual Soldiers that choose to participate in military operations in Iraq.
cause.name: Save the Troops!
